DOC.brief_summary: Aim : examine caries occurrence child ten year ago receive mixture probiotic infancy . Hypothesis : administration probiotic infancy effect future dental health .
DOC.brief_title: Does Administration Probiotics During Infancy Increase Caries Risk Child
DOC.criteria: Child participate probiotic milk intervention study early 2000 Child live within 100 km Turku Child chronic illness affect dental health Child live outside 100 km Turku
